books.title: “My Experiments with Truth”
books.author: Mahatma Gandhi
books.description: An autobiography of Mahatma Gandhi, detailing his early life, struggles, and philosophy of non-violence.

books.title: The Broken Wings
books.author: Sarojini Naidu
books.description: A poetic novel by Sarojini Naidu, exploring themes of love and loss.

books.title: Unhappy India
books.author: Lala Lajpat Rai
books.description: A critical analysis of the socio-political conditions in India during the early 20th century.
